Name: Simulation world
About the game: Welcome to Simulation World . There is an important task for you to restart the simulation. Simulation World is a world of puzzles that are solved by the little people living there. The problem is that peaceful labor has suddenly disrupted the virus, it is going to turn off the simulation. You are summoned to the rescue of the Simulation by higher minds, your nickname is Engineer . Life or death simulation is in your hands! If you want you can save it, or you can turn it off, the game is non-linear! What does this adventure have to offer the player?: - Puzzles that make you wiggle your brains; - 5 endings; - Open lampy world; - Dialogues with humor and references to films and games; - Story in which you will surely find something interesting for yourself. Successful completion of the mission, Engineer .
